name: Superior Anatomy Combat--DEMO 1.1
description:
First taste of the new ballbusting fighter from GpG!

In a tournament meant to prove, once and for all, which body type is superior, is there anything that will reveal itself as a critical factor to success in combat? Oh, the suspense!

Demo limited to 2 characters and 1 stage in Exhibition Mode. Full featured version soon to come.

Check out our Patreon for instant access to demos like these, as well as full releases.

https://www.patreon.com/groinpaingames
